definition: before the usual time or the time expected, at or near the beginning of a period of time or course of events or before the usual or expected time
details:
adverb
- before the usual time or the time expected
= example: before the usual time or the time expected
= synonyms: ahead of time, too soon
- in good time
= synonyms: betimes
- during an early stage
= example: during an early stage
= synonyms: early on
adjective
- at or near the beginning of a period of time or course of events or before the usual or expected time
= example: at or near the beginning of a period of time or course of events or before the usual or expected time
- being or occurring at an early stage of development
= example: being or occurring at an early stage of development
- of an early stage in the development of a language or literature
- very young
= example: very young
- expected in the near future
= example: expected in the near future
- belonging to the distant past
= synonyms: former
